FinServ_FinancialAccount__c.name: FinServ_FinancialAccount__c
FinServ_FinancialAccount__c.description: Represents a financial account such as an investment account, bank account, or insurance policy.

AccrualFrequency__c.description: The frequency the interest is accrued on the financial account.

AccruedInterest__c.description: The interest accrued on the financial account in the current statement period.

Address1__c.description: Street address line 1 for mailing address.

Address2__c.description: Street address line 2 for mailing address.

ApplicationDate__c.description: Date when this individual submitted the financial account application.

AssetRebalance__c.description: Indicates whether automatic portfolio rebalancing applies to this financial account (true) or not (false).

AvailableCredit__c.description: Total current available credit for this financial account.

AverageBalance__c.description: Average amount of money in the financial account, over a time period.

Balance__c.description: Amount of money in the financial account.

BalanceLastStatement__c.description: Account balance posted on last statement.

BookedDate__c.description: Date charge or credit booked to account.

BranchCode__c.description: The branch code of the financial account.

BranchName__c.description: The branch name of the financial account.

CashBalance__c.description: Cash available in the financial account.

CashLimit__c.description: Maximum cash withdrawal or advance amount.

CloseDate__c.description: Date when this financial account was closed.

CollateralDesc__c.description: Description of collateral provided for loan.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: If multiple currencies is enabled, contains the currency ISO code associated with the record.

DailyWithdrawalLimit__c.description: Amount that can be withdrawn in one day.

Discretionary__c.description: Indicates whether the advisor has discretionary trading authority for this financial account (true) or not (false).

DrawPeriodMonths__c.description: Number of months an individual can withdraw funds from a credit account.

ExpectedCloseDate__c.description: Expected date when the debit account or loan closes.

FinancialAccountChargesAndFees__c.description: Reference to Charges and Fees record for the account.

FinancialAccountNumber__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the financial account in an external data source. Label is Account Number.

FinancialAccountSource__c.description: Data source. Label is Source. Valid values: Integrator Manual Entry Pending

FinancialAccountType__c.description: Type of financial account. Label is Type. Valid values: 401(a) 401(k) 403(b) 529 Plan Brokerage Cash Management Account CD Checking Credit Card Discount Brokerage Fixed Annuity Individual Life IRA Mutual Fund Profit Sharing Rollover IRA Roth IRA Savings Term Life Variable Life Whole Life

HardwareSerial__c.description: The serial number of hardware associated with the account.

HeldAway__c.description: Indicates whether this financial account is managed or administered externally (true) or in-house (false).

HoldingCount__c.description: Number of holdings within this financial account. Calculated by roll-up summary. Label is Number of Holdings.

Household__c.description: Household that this financial account rolls up to.

IncomingVolume__c.description: The volume of transactions coming in through the service.

InsurancePaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount of insurance paid in the current tax year.

InsuredAmount__c.description: The insured value that an insurance policy covers.

InterestBalance__c.description: The interest balance on the financial account.

InterestPaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount of interest paid in the current tax year.

InsurancePolicy__c.description: The insurance policy associated with this financial account.

InvestmentObjectives__c.description: Purpose of this financial account. Valid values: Safety Income Growth Tax Optimization Liquidity

JointOwner__c.description: Joint owner of this financial account.

LastActivityDate.description: Timestamp for when this financial account last had a task or event action associated with the record.

LastReferencedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastTransactionDate.description: Timestamp for the last transaction on the account.

LastUpdated__c.description: Timestamp for when data for the financial account was last updated by an external data source.

LastViewedDate.description: Timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record.

LienHolder__c.description: Name of lien holder on the financial account.

Managed__c.description: Indicates whether this financial account is managed or administered (true), or not (false).

MinimumBalance__c.description: Minimum balance requirement for this financial account.

ModelPortfolio__c.description: Model asset allocation for the financial account. Valid values: Conservative Moderate Balanced Growth Aggressive

OpenDate__c.description: Date when the financial account was opened.

OutgoingVolume__c.description: The volume of transactions going out through the service.

OverDraftAllowed__c.description: Indicates whether the financial account allows an overdraft (true) or not (false).

OverDraftLinkedAccount__c.description: Reference to the linked overdraft account.

OverdraftProtection__c.description: Indicates whether the customer accepts overdraft protection and its associated fees.

OwnerId.description: ID of the user who created the financial account record.

Ownership__c.description: Type of ownership for the account. Valid values: Individual Joint Trust

OwnerType__c.description: Individual’s ownership role (primary or joint) for the account.

PaperlessDelivery__c.description: Account owner elects to receive electronic delivery of financial account documents (true) or not (false).

PaymentDueDate__c.description: Date when payment due on the account.

PaymentFrequency__c.description: Frequency of payments on the account. Valid values: Weekly Biweekly Monthly Quarterly Semiannually Annually

Performance1Yr__c.description: Performance measured over the past year.

Performance3Yr__c.description: Performance measured over the past three years.

PerformanceMTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past month-to-date.

PerformanceQTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past quarter-to-date.

PerformanceYTD__c.description: Performance measured over the past calendar year-to-date.

PolicyTerm__c.description: The period of coverage provided by the policy.

Premium__c.description: Amount paid to the insurer for insurance policy coverage.

PrimaryBankerIdentifier__c.description: The unique identifier of the primary banker who manages the financial account.

PrimaryBankerName__c.description: The name of the primary banker who manages the financial account.

PrimaryOwner__c.description: Primary owner of the financial account.

PrincipalBalance__c.description: Principal balance on the loan account.

PrincipalPaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount paid against the principal in the current tax year.

PropTaxPaidYearToDate__c.description: The total amount of property tax paid in the current tax year.

RebalanceFrequency__c.description: Frequency of portfolio rebalancing for this financial account. Valid values: Monthly Quarterly Semiannually Annually

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with this financial account.

RecordTypeName__c.description: Record type for this financial account. The value is copied from RecordType.Name and can’t be changed. Label is Record Type.

RenewalDate__c.description: Date when insurance policy renewal is due.

SecondaryBankerIdentifier__c.description: The unique identifier of the secondary banker who manages the financial account.

SecondaryBankerName__c.description: The name of the secondary banker who manages the financial account.

ServiceProvider__c.description: Custodian or recordkeeper of this financial account.

SourceSystemId__c.description: ID that uniquely identifies the financial account in an external data source.

StatementFrequency__c.description: Frequency statements are issued. Valid values: Monthly Biweekly Quarterly Annually

Status__c.description: Status of this financial account. Valid values: Open Closed On Hold Pending

TargetLimit__c.description: The limit on items or value that the service processes.

TaxID__c.description: Tax Identification Number associated with this financial account.

TaxStatus__c.description: Type of tax treatment this financial account qualifies for. Valid values: Nonqualified Qualified

TermDepositMaturityDate__c.description: The date a fixed term deposit matures.

TimeHorizon__c.description: Investment time frame for this financial account. Valid values: Long Term Medium Term Short Term

TotalHoldAmountAsOfDate__c.description: The date the total hold amount is relevant.

TotalHoldAmount__c.description: The total hold amount on the financial account.

Type__c.description: Type of account. Valid values: Brokerage Discount Brokerage CD Checking Cash Management Account Credit Card Savings Mutual Fund, Fixed Annuity Variable Annuity Managed Account Individual Life Term Life Variable Life Whole Life
